name: SCNReferenceNode
desc: A scene graph node that serves as a placeholder for content to be loaded from a separate scene file.

items.name: init?(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a node whose content is to be loaded from the referenced URL.

items.name: var referenceURL: URL
items.desc: The URL to a scene file from which to load content for the reference node.

items.name: var loadingPolicy: SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy
items.desc: An option for whether to load the node’s content automatically.

items.name: func load()
items.desc: Loads content into the node from its referenced external scene file.

items.name: var isLoaded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the reference node has already loaded its content.

items.name: func unload()
items.desc: Removes the node’s children and marks the node as not loaded.

items.name: enum SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy
items.desc: Options for when to load the reference node’s content, used by the loadingPolicy property.
